# Fitting Surrogates

We first load the config:

```{r}
library(checkmate)
library(paradox)
library(data.table)
devtools::load_all()
cfg = BenchmarkConfigNB301$new(
  workdir = paste0(path.expand("~"), "/LRZ Sync+Share/multifidelity_data")
)
```

The `config` has an active binding `data`

```{r}
head(cfg$data)
```


```{r}


library(data.table)
dt = readRDS("dt.rds")
dt[Species == "virginica"]


library(data.table)
foobar = function() {
  dt = readRDS("dt.rds")
  dt[Species == "virginica"]
}
foobar()



devtools::load_all()
library(data.table)
foobar()
```
